Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the creation of *Miss March*?
Options:
A. a) Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger wrote and developed Miss March as a writing exercise.
B. b) Miss March was offered to Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger by Fox for writing purposes.
C. c) Miss March was produced by a different studio.
D. d) Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger are known for their work in comedy.
Answer: a) Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger wrote and developed Miss March as a writing exercise., b) Miss March was offered to Trevor Moore and Zach Cregger by Fox for writing purposes.
